definition: slow/unhurried/sluggish/gradual/not tense/relaxed/to postpone/to defer/to stall/to stave off/to revive/to recuperate

sentences.english: The Rapel Valley weather ripened fruit slowly , and Cabernet Sauvignon developed intense flavours.
sentences.chinese: 蘭佩谷的氣候使得葡萄成熟緩慢，並帶有濃郁的香氣。

sentences.english: Conclusion Tibia fracture healing delays after ovariectomy.
sentences.chinese: 結論卵巢切除後，脛骨骨折癒合緩慢。

sentences.english: Under these conditions, ethnic family patterns were slowly broken down by an increasingly urbanized, industrialized environment.
sentences.chinese: 工業化的日益發展，種族家庭的模式緩慢地解體。

sentences.english: Squint your eyes a little and move your head slowly to make it look like the world is spinning around you.
sentences.chinese: 稍微眯眼，緩慢的移動你的頭好想世界在你周圍旋轉。

sentences.english: A truck brings in a delivery in through a wide, slow-moving gate.
sentences.chinese: 一輛卡車通過一扇寬闊的緩慢開啓的大門運送物資。

sentences.english: And as we all know, change is often slow and incremental.
sentences.chinese: 正如我們所知，變革往往是緩慢和漸進的。

sentences.english: Furthermore, over the past four years, the process of issuing these documents has been tediously slow.
sentences.chinese: 而且，在過去四年中，這個確認過程非常的緩慢。

sentences.english: Your PC is slow in boot-up and operation?
sentences.chinese: 您的電腦是否啓動和運行緩慢？

sentences.english: Extraoral vast shoals of the Pearl River waterfront, the underwater beach off the coast to slow gradient.
sentences.chinese: 珠江口外海濱灘塗遼闊，水下灘地向岸外緩慢坡降。

sentences.english: Blind bit of test the waters with a bamboo pole and going very slow.
sentences.chinese: 盲人用竹竿點點探探，走得極緩慢。

sentences.english: The leaves of the trees left, the car in the snow in slowly moving forward.
sentences.chinese: 樹上的葉子所剩無幾，汽車在雪地中緩慢地行駛着。

sentences.english: China's co-financed railway is progressing at a quite slow speed.
sentences.chinese: 所以，中國合資鐵路發展緩慢。
道路結冰時要緩慢地剎車。

sentences.english: His breathing slowed and he closed his eyes.
sentences.chinese: 索皮的呼吸變得緩慢了，它閉上了眼睛。

sentences.english: The stem slowly turned an unhealthy shade of yellow.
sentences.chinese: 莖幹緩慢轉變成不健康的黃色。

sentences.english: Some of the new features raise security concerns and may cause slower deployment.
sentences.chinese: 一些新的特性引起了安全隱患，並可能導致部署緩慢。

definition: slow/unhurried/sluggish/gradual/not tense/relaxed/to postpone/to defer/to stall/to stave off/to revive/to recuperate
expansion/dilation/to expand (e.g. one's power or influence)/to broaden
whole entity/entire body/synthesis/as a whole (situation, construction, team etc)/global/macrocosm/integral/holistic/whole
